meanings.definition: The state or quality of being attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her comelinesses caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The comelinesses of the flowers in the garden brightened up the whole yard.
meanings.sent3: The comelinesses of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The comelinesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The comelinesses of the bride in her wedding gown left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The comelinesses of the outfit made it perfect for the occasion.
meanings.sent2: His comelinesses in handling the situation impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The comelinesses of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The comelinesses of the solution brought peace to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The comelinesses of her words calmed the anxious crowd.
